WSO2 Governance Registry - User Guide
Governance Dashboard
The Governance Dashboard consists of a number of gadgets that provides a visual representation of various data present in the WSO2 Governance Registry.
The functionality of each of these gadgets will be illustrated below under different sections.
The Impact Analysis Gadget
This gadget gives an impact analysis of various artifacts associated with web services. An overview of the associated schemas, WSDLs and policies are shown for each service. If a WSDL has associated schemas/policies, these dependencies are also shown in this gadget.
The drop down list allows you to select any of the services present in the Governance Registry. When a service is selected all associated artifacts are displayed in a dependency tree. A click on any of the nodes on the tree opens the relevant resource.
The Resource Impact Gadget
This gadget shows the impact which any resource has to any other resources. An overview of the relations and the related resources are shown for a resource.
The text box allows you to enter a path of a resource. When the path is submitted, the respective associations and associated resources are shown as a dependency tree. A click on a respective node bring it into focus.
The Lifecycle Stage Monitor Gadget
The lifecycle gadget gives an accumulation of the number of services in each life cycle. A pie chart displays this through each life cycle.
The drop down list allows you to select any lifecycle which has been associated with at least one service resource on the registry. For each selection a chart is shown giving the number of services in each lifecycle.
